languages.text: Мастер дисциплины лично взялась отыскать подозреваемого Гведона, чтобы Вольный Торговец смог{mf||ла} принять его исповедь. Расследование завершится там же, где и началось — в кают-компании офицерской палубы.

The Master-at-Arms has taken matters into her own hands. She will find the suspect, Gwedon, so that the Rogue Trader may receive his confession. The investigation will conclude where it began — in the mess hall of the officers' deck.
languages.original_text: Мастер дисциплины лично взялась отыскать подозреваемого Гведона, чтобы Вольный Торговец смог{mf||ла} принять его исповедь. Расследование завершится там же, где и началось — в кают-компании офицерской палубы.

languages.text: La capitaine d'armes a pris les choses en main et va se charger de trouver le suspect, Gwedon, pour que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} puisse entendre sa confession. L'enquête va s'achever là où elle a commencé, au mess du pont des officiers.
languages.original_text: The Master-at-Arms has taken matters into her own hands. She will find the suspect, Gwedon, so that the Rogue Trader may receive his confession. The investigation will conclude where it began — in the mess hall of the officers' deck.

traits.locale_text: La capitaine d'armes a pris les choses en main et va se charger de trouver le suspect, Gwedon, pour que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} puisse entendre sa confession. L'enquête va s'achever là où elle a commencé, au mess du pont des officiers.

languages.text: La maestra de armas se ocupará personalmente de la situación. Encontrará al sospechoso, Gwedon, para que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente pueda escuchar lo que tiene que decir. La investigación terminará donde terminó: la cantina de la cubierta de oficiales.
languages.original_text: The Master-at-Arms has taken matters into her own hands. She will find the suspect, Gwedon, so that the Rogue Trader may receive his confession. The investigation will conclude where it began — in the mess hall of the officers' deck.

traits.locale_text: La maestra de armas se ocupará personalmente de la situación. Encontrará al sospechoso, Gwedon, para que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente pueda escuchar lo que tiene que decir. La investigación terminará donde terminó: la cantina de la cubierta de oficiales.

languages.text: 戒律大师准备亲自调查这件事情。她承诺会找到嫌疑犯戈登，让行商浪人聆听戈登的供词。调查是从军官甲板的食堂开始的，也会在那里结束。
languages.original_text: The Master-at-Arms has taken matters into her own hands. She will find the suspect, Gwedon, so that the Rogue Trader may receive his confession. The investigation will conclude where it began — in the mess hall of the officers' deck.

traits.locale_text: 戒律大师准备亲自调查这件事情。她承诺会找到嫌疑犯戈登，让行商浪人聆听戈登的供词。调查是从军官甲板的食堂开始的，也会在那里结束。

languages.text: マスター・アット・アームズは自分で解決することにした。自由開拓者がを告白を入手できるよう、容疑者のグウェドンを見つけることにする。捜査は始まりの場所、つまり士官デッキの食堂で幕を閉じることになる。
languages.original_text: The Master-at-Arms has taken matters into her own hands. She will find the suspect, Gwedon, so that the Rogue Trader may receive his confession. The investigation will conclude where it began — in the mess hall of the officers' deck.

traits.locale_text: マスター・アット・アームズは自分で解決することにした。自由開拓者がを告白を入手できるよう、容疑者のグウェドンを見つけることにする。捜査は始まりの場所、つまり士官デッキの食堂で幕を閉じることになる。

languages.text: Die Waffenmeisterin hat die Dinge selbst in die Hand genommen. Sie wird Gwedon ausfindig machen, damit er vor {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} ein Geständnis ablegen kann. Die Untersuchung endet, wo alles begann ... in der Messe des Offiziersdecks.
languages.original_text: The Master-at-Arms has taken matters into her own hands. She will find the suspect, Gwedon, so that the Rogue Trader may receive his confession. The investigation will conclude where it began — in the mess hall of the officers' deck.

traits.locale_text: Die Waffenmeisterin hat die Dinge selbst in die Hand genommen. Sie wird Gwedon ausfindig machen, damit er vor {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} ein Geständnis ablegen kann. Die Untersuchung endet, wo alles begann ... in der Messe des Offiziersdecks.

languages.text: Silahtar, vaziyete el attı. Şüpheli Gwedon'u bulacak. Bu sayede Hür Tacir, Gwedon'un itirafını dinleyebilecek. Sorgu başladığı yerde, yani subay güvertesi yemekhanesinde bitecek.
languages.original_text: The Master-at-Arms has taken matters into her own hands. She will find the suspect, Gwedon, so that the Rogue Trader may receive his confession. The investigation will conclude where it began — in the mess hall of the officers' deck.
